propositions.original_proposition: Rent values for 'Luxury Apartments' in central London boroughs peaked during Q3 2022, showing a 25% increase from Q2.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Luxury apartment rents in central London boroughs surged notably in the third quarter of 2022 compared to the previous quarter.
propositions.chart_title: Luxury Apartment Rent Surge in Central London
propositions.chart_description: Comparison of rent values for luxury apartments in central London boroughs during Q2 and Q3 2022.
propositions.reasoning: A bar chart effectively highlights the comparison of rent values across different boroughs and time periods, making it easy to visualize the increase.
tapas_questions: Which borough had the highest rent increase for luxury apartments?
How do Q3 rent values compare to Q2 for luxury apartments?

propositions.original_proposition: From 2011 to 2023, 'Family Homes' in outer London boroughs experienced a 30% increase in rent values, with the highest growth in 2020.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Rent values for 'Family Homes' in outer London boroughs have shown a notable upward trend since 2011, with a peak growth observed in 2020.
propositions.chart_title: Trend in Family Home Rents in Outer London
propositions.chart_description: Line chart showing rent value trends from 2011 to 2023 in outer London boroughs.
propositions.reasoning: A line chart effectively illustrates trends over time, highlighting changes in rent values across the specified period.
tapas_questions: Which year had the highest growth in rent values?

propositions.original_proposition: In 2023, 'Studio' apartments in North London boroughs showed a 10% higher rent value compared to South London.
propositions.reworded_proposition: In 2023, 'Studio' apartments in North London boroughs tended to have higher rent values compared to those in the South.
propositions.chart_title: Rent Comparison of Studio Apartments in London
propositions.chart_description: Comparing 2023 rent values of studio apartments in North vs. South London boroughs.
